settings.title: Timber Finish: A Commitment to Excellence
settings.text:
At Ruby, we take pride in the artistry and dedication that goes into each piece of furniture we create. Our commitment to quality is reflected in every stage of the manufacturing process, ensuring that your furniture is not only beautiful, but also built to last.

From hand-selecting premium timber to final, rigorous quality checks, each step is meticulously designed to uphold the highest standards.

Our head of manufacturing personally oversees and signs off on every stage, guaranteeing that the piece arriving at your door meets our uncompromising quality.

settings.overlay_text: Every piece of timber in our handmade furniture, including mantels, shelves, and slatted wall panels, is smooth-planed for a polished look and feel.

settings.title: Rounded Edges for Comfort and Style
settings.text:
We understand that the details make all the difference, which is why all visible edges are carefully rounded. This subtle, elegant touch adds a sense of refinement while also preventing sharp edges, enhancing safety and comfort. The result is a piece of furniture that feels luxurious to the touch and looks impeccable from every angle.

Solid Joinery-Grade Pine: Strength Meets Beauty

Our furniture is crafted using only the finest joinery-grade pine.

This robust, durable material is selected for its strength and longevity, providing you with heavy-duty furniture, shelving, or paneling that stands the test of time. Joinery-grade pine not only ensures stability but also exhibits a timeless aesthetic that complements any interior.

settings.title: The Ruby Furniture Manufacturing Process
settings.text: Our process, carried out in our Devon workshop, combines traditional craftsmanship with modern precision to bring you furniture of unparalleled quality.

settings.title: Step 1 - Timber Selection
settings.text: Our skilled carpenters personally select each piece of solid wood, ensuring only the best materials are used. Every board is chosen for its strength, appearance, and lack of imperfections, allowing us to craft a finished product that meets our exacting standards.

settings.title: Step 2 - Machining for Precision
settings.text: Using state-of-the-art machinery, our team carefully machines each piece to achieve perfect dimensions and finishes. This process allows for extreme accuracy, which is essential for creating furniture that is both structurally sound and visually flawless.

settings.title: Step 3 - Hand Assembly by Skilled Craftsmen
settings.text:
Assembly is where our expertise truly shines.

Our carpenters and joiners meticulously construct each piece by hand, combining artistry with precision. Each join and joint is crafted for durability, ensuring that your furniture is both beautiful and built to endure daily use.

settings.title: Step 4 - Rigorous Quality Assurance
settings.text: Every piece goes through a rigorous quality check. Each stage is inspected and signed off by our head of manufacturing, ensuring the product is flawless. This final step guarantees that what arrives at your doorstep is a piece of furniture that exemplifies Ruby Furniture's dedication to craftsmanship and quality.
